statements: UPDATE vendor_spend_patterns SET total_spent = 1500.25, last_purchase_date = '2022-04-20' WHERE vendor_id = 'abcde123'
UPDATE vendor_spend_patterns SET vendor_name = 'New Vendor Name', cost_saving_opportunities = 'Explore new opportunities' WHERE vendor_id = 'xyz987'
UPDATE vendor_spend_patterns SET total_spent = 15000.50, last_purchase_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE vendor_spend_patterns SET vendor_name = 'Example Vendor', cost_saving_opportunities = 'Explore alternative suppliers' WHERE vendor_id = '456e7890-12c3-45f6-7890-123456789abc';
UPDATE vendor_spend SET total_spend = 5000.00 WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_orders SET total_amount = 1500.00, order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE vendor_spend SET total_spend = total_spend + 5000.00 WHERE vendor_id = 123
UPDATE purchase_orders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1, order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE vendor_id = 456
UPDATE vendors SET vendor_location='New Location' WHERE vendor_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_amount=1500.75, purchase_date='2022-08-15' WHERE purchase_id=3;
UPDATE vendors SET vendor_location = 'New York' WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_amount = 2000.50, purchase_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE vendor_id = 3;
UPDATE vendors SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET category = 'Electronics', unit_price = 599.99 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE vendors SET vendor_name = 'New Vendor Name', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_orders SET total_cost = 5000.00, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE vendor_id = 2;
UPDATE vendor_spending SET spend_amount = 5000 WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_orders SET order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE order_id = 1001;

UPDATE purchase_orders SET order_total = 1500.50, order_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE vendor_id = 456 AND order_id = 789;
